segments.text: My gaze shifts to the center-left area of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper wall cabinet doors are wide open, which seems unusual for a tidy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside the left cabinet, I can clearly see a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR" filled with cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is climbing, partially standing on a two-step stool placed on the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed and tilted at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable and close to tipping backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's body is stretched upward, reaching towards the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already inside the cookie jar, actively retrieving cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he holds a plate, either as a makeshift lid or to catch any falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an ingenious, yet risky, maneuver.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter below the cabinet is clear, providing space for him to climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors and their edges frame his small figure quite dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR
